arts.ttl: Galatasaray mock Liverpool with savage 11-word dig after Champions League shock
arts.sum: The Turkish giants claimed a shock 1-0 win over Liverpool in the Champions League, and Galatasaray wasted no time in rubbing salt into the Reds' wounds on Tuesday night

arts.ttl: Liverpool Fans Criticize Florian Wirtz After Loss to Galatasaray
arts.sum: Liverpool fans have expressed their frustration towards midfielder Florian Wirtz following another lackluster performance against Galatasaray in the UEFA Champions League . Liverpool fans express disappointment in Florian Wirtz's performance during a 1-0 loss to Galatasaray.

arts.ttl: Arne Slot told he made Liverpool selection mistake vs Galatasaray - 'He's not comfortable'
arts.sum: Liverpool boss Arne Slot made the surprise decision to start Dominik Szoboszlai at right-back for his side's Champions League clash with Galatasaray on Wednesday night

arts.ttl: Highlights, round-up: Galatasaray stun Liverpool, Mbappé hits hat-trick
arts.sum: There were also big wins for Atleti, Bayern, Inter and Marseille on a night full of goals.

arts.ttl: Liverpool suffer Alisson Becker injury blow in defeat to Galatasaray
arts.sum: The Brazil goalkeeper is set to miss Saturday’s Premier League trip to Chelsea.

arts.ttl: Jamie Carragher insists Liverpool are 'NOT a top team' in withering takedown after Galatasaray defeat, as club legend urges Arne Slot to take star out of the firing line: 'Right now it is a mess'
arts.sum: In a damning verdict on the Reds, Carragher warned they were 'not a top team', claimed they were a 'mess' and said one star needed to be taken out of the side because he was 'not at the races at all'.

arts.ttl: Virgil van Dijk insists Liverpool ‘shouldn’t panic’ despite Galatasaray defeat
arts.sum: Arne Slot is perhaps yet to find the balance as he attempts to integrate several big-money signings

arts.ttl: Victor Osimhen makes Champions League history in Galatasaray's Liverpool scalp
arts.sum: Istanbul holds special memories for Liverpool after their famous comeback against AC Milan in the 2005 final but Arne Slot’s men endured a night to forget twenty years later. ‘Welcome...

arts.ttl: Alarm bells ringing for Arne as lacklustre Liverpool beaten by Galatasaray
arts.sum: A lacklustre Liverpool side are condemned to back-to-back defeats as Galatasaray clinch a deserved 1-0 victory in their Champions League league-phase clash at RAMS Park.

arts.ttl: Disaster night for Liverpool as Galatasaray win amid double injury woe
arts.sum: Victor Osimhen's first-half penalty gave Galatasaray a 1-0 win over Liverpool on a disastrous night for Arne Slot's side, who suffered back-to-back losses for the second time under the Dutchman.
